FAILED! More detail please. I tried to follow your instructions:

-Used WinRAR and opened RWED.iso and extracted to some random folder.
-Used Daemon (Lite) to mount RWED.iso...nothing came up...

Grr...! >:P
Also, when I press "Extract to..." on WinRAR for the iso, the place I extracted to is containing all the files that are in the iso. I don't think that's supposed to happen.

I figured it out by myself! I will post it for reference:

-Once the torrent is downloaded, open it.
-Now you need to download WinRAR and Daemon Tools Lite.
-Open "RWED.part01" (or any other partX) with WinRAR.
-Click "Extract to..." and extract to a random location where you can find it.
-Click on Daemon Tools icon, and mount the file you extracted in the previous step. (RWED, not the one you extracted from, e.g. RWED.part01)
-:D

What the hell. Ok so it installs successfully, then it tells me wrong disk inserted.

There is a crack included guys. Explore the ISO and go to the folder named deviance or whatever. You'll find a rar file. Extract and copy the files in that folder to the install directory. This is the CD crack and it'll stop asking for a disc.

There's one small problem with this. The cracked EXE is detected as a trojan. Obviously everyone knows there's false positives everywhere. Just a heads up and a guide on how to find the crack. Use it at your own risk.

The virus total report:

https://www.virustotal.com/file/65a2d4ead0f02926a611d79a29a61fc7a6be01366e75a061259c1c255091884b/analysis/1333129198/

Personally I'd say it's most certainly just a false positive, of course if it isn't then a virus is easier to remove for some people than others. This might change your opinion on if it's worth the risk of using it.

Hello Guys, People interested in Robot Arena 2 / Robot Wars should check this torrent

It includes all community made Arena's / Bot Designs / Custom Textures / Custom Components.

Check it out at:https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7284985/Robot_Arena_Robot_Arena_2_Modded_Robot_Wars[ShottaRip]

Game works perfectly... I'm using Win7 and MagicDisc to mount.  Mount it, and if no auto-run, open up windows explorer and run setup inside the cd yourself.  Also, the crack is inside one of the folders of the cd.   When installing & the directx error occurs, Ctl+Alt+Del and stop the setup, it's already done and fully installed.  Then crack it and you are ready to go!!  Use arrow keys to drive, right shift for main weapon, and right control for secondary weapon.  Hope this helps any who were having trouble.  Two thumbs up uploader
